name: Ruined Square
description: You stand in the midst of a city in ruins. All around you are ruined buildings made of gray stone and piles of rubble.

args: The building to the south is sealed shut by a brick wall. You'll have to deal with that first.
The way west is sealed by a heavy stone door.
To the west, an open doorway leads to a ruined hall.
To the west, a heavy stone door blocks the way.

features.look: It's a heavy stone door blocking the way.

roomDesc: ifNotFlagWrite|WALLDESTROYED|To the south is a ruined building with its entrance bricked over. The brick wall is covered in fractures and looks weakened.
ifFlagWrite|WALLDESTROYED|To the south is a ruined building. A brick wall once sealed its entrance but it's been destroyed and allows entry.
features.smash|destroy|break|kick|bash: You're not strong enough to break it down with your bare hands.

use: You consider using the brick wall and then realize the absurdity of that statement.

args: It's already been broken open. You smash up a couple loose bricks to make yourself feel better.

You take the sledgehammer in hand and swing with all your might. You shatter a brick in the center of the wall, bowing the entire wall inward slightly. After another few strong strikes, the wall gives out and collapses into a heap of bricks. The way south is open.
